longBusinessSummary: BioPlus Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses in the life sciences industry. BioPlus Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Jonathan M. N. Rigby MBA
companyOfficers.title: Chairman & Chief Bus. Officer
